title: Data Challenge Finalist
description: Gained mentorship from Data Engineers and Data Scientists at Facebook
Participated in mock interviews with Facebook Engineers
Attended SQL bootcamp conducted by Facebook Data Engineer

title: Data Science Fellow
description: Selected as a Data Science Fellow at Cal Poly for the academic year 2020-2021
Attended weekly seminars to discuss readings about Data Science, as well as Data Science related topics in Statistics and Computer Science
Assisted students in introductory data science classes with activities
Worked on a Data Science related project that analyzes the spread of Covid

title: Junior Software Developer
description: Improved codebase infrastructure by merging similar Angular projects into a mono repo Angular project supporting multiple sub projects, each with their own configuration and commands
Additionally, merged git history of projects and unified the AWS Code Pipeline for the merged projects
Improved code base quality by documenting formatting guidelines and developing formatting tools for multiple text editors
Improved website accessibility by defining accessibility guidelines and rewriting multiple complex Angular template files to set an example for future development
Improved website performance (speed and memory) by modularizing pages to load them lazily (asynchronously)

Decreased resource cost used for deployement through AWS Code Pipeline by 30% by upgrading it to the latest available CDK and using one build job to generate localized artifacts instead of a build job for each locale

title: Frontend Software Engineer Intern
description: Developed a workflow builder that allows users to create highly customizable workflows to analyze site speed regression
Ensured 100% test coverage by writing unit, acceptance, and integration tests that cover wide range of use cases
Built a mock server with Mirage to reduce dependency on a working backend when developing client side of the application
Helped develop a mid-tier API for the workflow builder that conforms to the JSON API spec using Flask
Attended workshops and bootcamps to learn more about Build Pipelines, Samza, Bazel, Azure, deployment, etc.
Misc: Documented code comprehensively, made control params for loading dashboard data dynamic, added breadcrumb feature to intuitively navigate a workflow (between dashboards)

title: Data Science Research Assistant
description: Implemented CLI for batch collection of data from Weedmaps API
Fixed data collection by updating headers for GET requests and replaced web scraping for meta data with API requests
Refactored code to reduce code duplication and to be object oriented
Increased developer productivity by setting up a test suite in Python and adding unit tests to ensure essential functionalities work as they should

title: Software Engineering Coop
description: Reduced crash sessions on Android by ~20% by fixing high priority bugs, implementing client facing features using React-Native, and writing unit tests using Jest to expand code coverage
Rebuilt the Careers page for the corporation website by fetching information from Greenhouse's Job Board API and manipulating the DOM with JavaScript and jQuery
Built functionality for internally used Admin Portal with Ruby on Rails and React to manage newly developed product features
Reduced code duplication and increased code reusability by applying object-oriented principles
Increased efficiency during development by automating tedious tasks such as version control with git and generation of code based on a spec using bash and Python
Published an npm package with 100+ weekly downloads to open source a utility that conditionally renders react-native components in JSX by transforming code with babel
Misc: Error tracking with AWS events on native side, rebuilt Notification Toast in app using React-Native's PanResponder and Animated libraries

title: Freelance Developer
description: Gained valuable front-end web development experience by developing blogging websites in WordPress

Automated repetitive tasks for clients: coded a PHP script to add a watermark on images from a command-line interface, made Google Sheets more functional by programming in the script editor with JavaScript
Tested products by startups for bugs and suggested useful improvements
Optimized websites for search engines (SEO) by increasing loading speed, ranking them higher on search engines for target keywords, etc

title: Girls Who Code
description: Learned the fundamentals of web development, app development, robotics, and cybersecurity
Wrote multiple working python scripts to perform simple tasks
Collaborated with a peer to build a highly functional, planning app (iOS) for high schoolers to help them manage their time and goals effectively

title: Java Instructor
description: Assists people across the globe (in more than 160 countries) in learning the fundamentals of Java through comprehensive lectures, coding exercises, assignments, and a responsive Q&A section
Has a 4+ rating, stellar reviews, and more than 40,000 students enrolled

title: Backend Engineer
description: Automated transfer of payroll information about employees from our Employee Management Portal to payroll services (such as Paychex) by developing a stored procedure in SQL Server
Increased browser compatibility for taking a signature from an external device on all forms by updating existing signature functionality in Visual Basic

title: Front End Web Development Intern
